Structs/Folder/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloud.abstract: The folder permissions assigned to this folder by its owner. Non-nil only when the user accessing this folder is not its owner.

Structs/Folder/Permissions.html#/s:14PCl.name: canCreate

Structs/Folder/Permissions.html#/s:14PCl.name: canModify

Structs/Folder/Permissions.html#/s:14PCl.name: canDelete

Structs/Folder.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6.name: root

Structs/File/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudSD.abstract: true if the user accessing this file is its owner, false otherwise.

Structs/File/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudSD.name: hasThumbnail

Protocols/NetworkOperation.html#/s:14PCl.name: enqueue()
Protocols/NetworkOperation.html#/s:14PCl.abstract: Enqueues the operation to run as soon as possible if the current state of the operation is NetworkOperationState.suspended.

Protocols/HostProvider.html#/s:14PCloudS.name: defaultHostName
Protocols/HostProvider.html#/s:14PCloudS.abstract: The current default pCloud API host name.

Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html#/s:14PClo.name: Value
Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html#/s:14PClo.abstract: The type of the return value of a method.

Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html#/s:14PClo.name: Parser
Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html#/s:14PClo.abstract: A block computing the return value of a method from an API response dictionary.

Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html#/s:14PClo.name: requiresAuthentication
Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html#/s:14PClo.abstract: true if a method requires authentication, false otherwise. Methods requiring authentication

Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html#/s:14PClo.name: createResponseParser()
Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html#/s:14PClo.abstract: Creates and returns a parser for the response from an API call.

Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html#/s:14PClo.name: createCommand()
Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html#/s:14PClo.abstract: Creates and returns an API command for a method.

Protocols/Cancellable.html#/s:14PCloudSD.name: isCancelled
Protocols/Cancellable.html#/s:14PCloudSD.abstract: true if this resource has been disposed of, false otherwise.

Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html.name: PCloudApiMethod
Protocols/PCloudApiMethod.html.abstract: An object defining input and output for a call to the pCloud API.

Protocols/CallOperation.html.name: CallOperation
Protocols/CallOperation.html.abstract: A network operation that knows how to execute a pCloud API call.

Protocols/UploadOperation.html.name: UploadOperation
Protocols/UploadOperation.html.abstract: A network operation that knows how to execute an upload to pCloud.

Protocols/DownloadOperation.html.name: DownloadOperation
Protocols/DownloadOperation.html.abstract: A network operation that knows how to execute a download.

Protocols/OAuthAuthorizationFlowView.htm.name: OAuthAuthorizationFlowView
Protocols/OAuthAuthorizationFlowView.htm.abstract: Executes UI-specific actions related to the OAuth authorization flow.

Enums/Result.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6Re.name: isSuccess
Enums/Result.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6Re.abstract: true when this instance represents a success, false otherwise.

Enums/Result.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6Re.name: isFailure
Enums/Result.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6Re.abstract: true when this instance represents a failure, false otherwise.

Enums/Result.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6Re.name: payload
Enums/Result.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6Re.abstract: The associated value if this instance represents a success, nil otherwise.

Enums/Result.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6Re.name: error
Enums/Result.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6Re.abstract: The associated error if this instance represents a failure, nil otherwise.

Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.name: id
Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.abstract: The unique identifier of this content item.

Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.name: name
Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.abstract: The name of this content item as it appears in the file system.

Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.name: parentFolderId
Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.abstract: The unique identifier of the parent folder of this item.

Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.name: createdTime
Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.abstract: The unix timestamp of the creation time of this content item. This is the time the file was created in the pCloud file system.

Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.name: modifiedTime
Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.abstract: The unix timestamp of the last modification time of this content item’s metadata or content (for files).

Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.name: isShared
Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.abstract: true if this content item is accessible to other people through folder sharing, false otherwise.

Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.name: init(id:name:parentFolderId:createdTime:modifiedTime:isShared:)
Enums/Content/Metadata.html#/s:14PCloudS.abstract: Initializes a content item with all fields of this class.

Enums/Content/Metadata.html.name: Metadata
Enums/Content/Metadata.html.abstract: Base class for a folder content item in pCloud with common fields for files and folders.

Enums/Content.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift7C.name: isFolder
Enums/Content.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift7C.abstract: true if this content item is a folder, false otherwise.

Enums/Content.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift7C.name: isFile
Enums/Content.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift7C.abstract: true if this content item is a file, false otherwise.

Enums/Content.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift7C.name: folderMetadata
Enums/Content.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift7C.abstract: The folder metadata for this content item. Non-nil only when this content item is a folder.

Enums/NetworkOperationState.html#/s:14PC.name: completed
Enums/NetworkOperationState.html#/s:14PC.abstract: The operation has completed either successfully or due to a failure.

Enums/NetworkOperationState.html.name: NetworkOperationState
Enums/NetworkOperationState.html.abstract: The possible execution states of a network operation.

Enums/Result.html.name: Result
Enums/Result.html.abstract: The result of a task that can either succeed or fail. The task produces a value on successful completion or an error on failure.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: controller
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: The underlying task controller.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: init(controller:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Initializes a new instance.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: fetchUserInfo()
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for fetching user metadata.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: listFolder(_:recursively:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for fetching folder metadata along with metadata of its contents.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: createFolder(named:inFolder:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for creating a folder.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: renameFolder(_:to:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for renaming a folder.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: moveFolder(_:toFolder:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for moving a folder.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: copyFolder(_:toFolder:onConflict:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for copying a folder.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: deleteFolderRecursively(_:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for deleting a folder along with all of its children recursively.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: upload(_:toFolder:asFileNamed:withModificationDate:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for uploading a file from a Data object.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: upload(fromFileAt:toFolder:asFileNamed:withModificationDate:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for uploading a file from a local file.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: copyFile(_:toFolder:overwrite:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for copying a file.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: renameFile(_:to:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for renaming a file.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: moveFile(_:toFolder:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for moving a file.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: deleteFile(_:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for deleting a file.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: getFileLink(forFile:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for generating a link from which a file can be downloaded.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: getThumbnailLink(forFile:thumbnailSize:forceExactThumbnailSize:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for generating a link from which a thumbnail for a file can be downloaded. Only files with hasThumbnail set to true

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: getThumbnailLinks(forFiles:thumbnailSize:forceExactThumbnailSize:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for generating thumbnail links for multiple files. Logically equivalent to calling getThumbnailLink() for multiple files.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: downloadFile(from:to:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for downloading a file from a URL.

Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: downloadFile(_:to:)
Classes/PCloudClient.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Creates and returns a task for downloading a file from a file identifier.

Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: isCancelled
Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: true if cancel() has been invoked on this task, false otherwise.

Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: init(addressProvider:operationBuilder:)
Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Initializes a new task with a block for obtaining a resource address and a block for creating a download operation from a resource address.

Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: setProgressBlock(_:)
Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Assigns a progress block to this instance to be called continuously as data is being downloaded.

Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: setCompletionBlock(_:)
Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Assigns a completion block to this instance to be called when the task completes either successfully or with a failure.

Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: start()
Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Starts the task if it is not already running.

Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.name: cancel()
Classes/DownloadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDK.abstract: Interrupts and invalidates this task. An invalidated task cannot run again.

Classes/ApiTaskController.html#/s:14PClo.name: init(hostProvider:authenticator:callDispatcher:uploadDispatcher:downloadDispatcher:)
Classes/ApiTaskController.html#/s:14PClo.abstract: Initializes a controller with a host provider, command authenticator and network operation builders.

Classes/ApiTaskController.html#/s:14PClo.name: call(_:onHost:)
Classes/ApiTaskController.html#/s:14PClo.abstract: Dispatches and returns a task for a specific pCloud API method.

Classes/ApiTaskController.html#/s:14PClo.name: upload(_:body:onHost:)
Classes/ApiTaskController.html#/s:14PClo.abstract: Dispatches and returns an upload task using a specific API method.

Classes/ApiTaskController.html#/s:14PClo.name: download(addressProvider:destination:)
Classes/ApiTaskController.html#/s:14PClo.abstract: Creates and returns a download task given an address provider and a destination.

Classes/Atomic.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6.name: value
Classes/Atomic.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6.abstract: The underlying value of this instance. Getting and setting the value is done atomically.

Classes/Atomic.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6.name: init(_:)
Classes/Atomic.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6.abstract: Initializes a new instance with a value.

Classes/Atomic.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6.name: modify(_:)
Classes/Atomic.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift6.abstract: Atomically modifies this instance’s value and returns the old one.

Classes/Lock.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift4Lo.name: inCriticalScope(_:)
Classes/Lock.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift4Lo.abstract: Executes a block inside a lock/unlock transaction.

Classes/WebViewControllerMobile.html#/s:.name: init(address:redirectHandler:cancelHandler:)
Classes/WebViewControllerMobile.html#/s:.abstract: Initializes a new view controller with a web view.

Classes/UploadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSw.name: isCancelled
Classes/UploadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSw.abstract: true if cancel() has been invoked on this instance, false otherwise.

Classes/UploadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSw.abstract: Assigns a completion block to this instance to be called when the task completes either successfully or with a failure.

Classes/UploadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSw.name: setProgressBlock(_:)
Classes/UploadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSw.abstract: Assigns a progress block to this instance to be called continuously as data is being uploaded.

Classes/UploadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSw.name: start()
Classes/UploadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSw.abstract: Starts the task if it is not already running.

Classes/UploadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSw.name: cancel()
Classes/UploadTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSw.abstract: Interrupts and invalidates the task. An invalidated task cannot run again.

Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.name: sharedClient
Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.abstract: A global client instance. Automatically initialized either inside setup() or authorize().

Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.name: setup(appKey:)
Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.abstract: Attempts to initialize a pCloud client instance by checking for an existing access token in the keychain.

Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.name: clearClient()
Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.abstract: Sets the global pCloud client instance to nil.

Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.name: createClient(accessToken:)

Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.name: unlinkAllUsers()
Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.abstract: Clears the global pCloud client and deletes all tokens.

Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.name: authorize(controller:_:)
Classes/PCloud.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwift0.abstract: Starts the OAuth authorization flow. Expects setup() to have been called.

Classes/URLSessionBasedDownloadOperation.abstract: Initializes an operation with a task and destination.

Classes/URLSessionEventHub.html#/s:14PCl.name: setObserver(_:for:)
Classes/URLSessionEventHub.html#/s:14PCl.abstract: Assigns an observer for a specific URLSessionTask. This unassigns the previous observer to the provided task.

Classes/URLSessionEventHub.html#/s:14PCl.name: removeObserver(for:)
Classes/URLSessionEventHub.html#/s:14PCl.abstract: Removes the observer for a specific URLSessionTask, if one exists.

Classes/CallTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwif.abstract: Initializes a non-running task with a network operation and a parser.

Classes/CallTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwif.abstract: Assigns a completion block to this instance to be called when the task completes either successfully or with a failure.

Classes/CallTask.html#/s:14PCloudSDKSwif.abstract: Starts the task if it is not already running.

Classes/URLSessionBasedNetworkOperation..name: URLSessionBasedNetworkOperation
Classes/URLSessionBasedNetworkOperation..abstract: Base class for network operations backed by URLSessionTask. Conforms to NetworkOperation. Forwards URLSessionObserver callbacks to blocks.

Classes/CallTask.html.name: CallTask
Classes/CallTask.html.abstract: Executes a network call to the pCloud API and produces an object on success from the API response.

Classes/URLSessionEventHub.html.name: URLSessionEventHub
Classes/URLSessionEventHub.html.abstract: Forwards callbacks from a URLSession to objects implementing URLSessionObserver. Assigns a single observer per URLSessionTask and that observer

Classes/PCloud.html.name: PCloud
Classes/PCloud.html.abstract: Convenience static class providing a global PCloudClient instance.

Classes/UploadTask.html.name: UploadTask
Classes/UploadTask.html.abstract: Executes an upload to the pCloud API and produces an object on success from the API response.

Classes/WebViewControllerPresenterMobile.name: WebViewControllerPresenterMobile
Classes/WebViewControllerPresenterMobile.abstract: A concrete implementation of OAuthAuthorizationFlowView based on UIKit.

Classes/WebViewControllerMobile.html.name: WebViewControllerMobile
Classes/WebViewControllerMobile.html.abstract: A view controller with a web view and a cancel button in the navigation bar. It forwards its navigation actions and cancel button

Classes/Lock.html.name: Lock
Classes/Lock.html.abstract: A non-recursive implementation of a mutex. Coordinates the operation of multiple threads of execution.

Classes/Atomic.html.name: Atomic
Classes/Atomic.html.abstract: An object providing atomic access to an underlying value.

Classes/ApiTaskController.html.name: ApiTaskController
Classes/ApiTaskController.html.abstract: Dispatches network tasks for pCloud API methods.

Classes/DownloadTask.html.name: DownloadTask
Classes/DownloadTask.html.abstract: A non-reusable mediator managing a task for obtaining an address for a resource, and a task for downloading the resource from

Classes/AnyCancellationToken.html.name: AnyCancellationToken
Classes/AnyCancellationToken.html.abstract: Concrete type-erased implementation of Cancellable. It forwards its cancel() invocation to a block.

Classes/PCloudClient.html.name: PCloudClient
Classes/PCloudClient.html.abstract: Wrapper around ApiTaskController providing convenient interface to common API methods.
